SELECT (b.id) AS id, (b.user_id) AS userId, (b.title) AS title, (b.content) AS content, (b.read_count) AS readCount, DATE_FORMAT(b.created_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt FROM fp_article b
WHERE b.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
WHERE b.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
INNER JOIN fp_user fp ON fp.id = b.user_id WHERE fp.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
ORDER BY b.id DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, 10

INNER JOIN fp_user fp ON fp.id = b.user_id WHERE fp.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
